name: bepo/turbo-suggest
description: Enhance your search experience by displaying categories and landing pages prominently in the search suggestions, making it easier for customers to find what they're looking for.

description.de-DE: Verbessern Sie Ihr Sucherlebnis, indem Sie Kategorien und Landing Pages prominent in den Suchvorschlägen anzeigen und Ihren Kunden so die Suche nach dem Gewünschten erleichtern.
description.en-GB: Enhance your search experience by displaying categories and landing pages prominently in the search suggestions, making it easier for customers to find what they're looking for.
